abilities.name: clean cuts
abilities.description: After using an ability, Xayah's next few basic attacks will hit all enemies along their path and dropping Feathers she can recall.

abilities.name: double daggers
abilities.description: Xayah throws two damaging daggers that also drop Feathers she can recall.

abilities.name: deadly plumage
abilities.description: Xayah creates a storm of blades that increase her basic attack speed and damage while granting her movement speed if she attacks a champion.

abilities.name: bladecaller
abilities.description: Xayah calls back all her dropped Feathers dealing damage and rooting enemies.

abilities.name: featherstorm
abilities.description: Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable and throwing out a fan of daggers, dropping Feathers she can recall.
